name: 2nd International Conference on Sentimental Analysis and Deep Learning ICSADL 2022
content: The 2nd International Conference on Sentimental Analysis and Deep Learning (ICSADL 2022) is a prominent event organized with the motivation for providing an international forum for all researchers, academicians and students for sharing their research findings on the different facets of Deep Learning and Sentimental Analysis techniques. ICSADL 2022 organized by Tribhuvan University, Nepal is held on 16-17, June 2022\. ICSADL 2022 aims to exchange and share new ideas and research results about all aspects of Sentimental analysis and deep learning which includes Artificial Intelligence, Innovations in robotics, Big Data and also converse the practical challenges encountered and the solutions adopted. ICSADL 2022 will highlight the areas of Statistical Learning Methods, Applied Intelligence, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Cognitive Computing.
organizers: Pulchowk Campus, Institute of Engineering, Tribhuvan University, Nepal.
